summary: A NYPD detective attempts to avenge the death of her father, but unwittingly becomes involved with one of his killers.
cast: John Leguizamo|Harvey Keitel|Florencia Lozano|Diane Venora|Wanda De Jesus|Manny Perez|Saul Stein|Benny Nieves|Luis Antonio Ramos|Raquel Castro|Tammy Trull|Raquel Jordan|Alex Luria|Gabriella Fanuele|Josh Segarra|Rick Sepulveda|Jamie Tirelli|Susan Porro|Sally Simone Dealy|John Hillner|Adrian Martinez|David Castro|Jason Fiore-Ortiz|Stracy Diaz|Dashia Imperiale|Tibor Feldman|Tania Santiago|Melina Lizette|Michael Sirow|Tomorrow Baldwin Montgomery|Monica Steuer|Douglas Schneider|Quinton Aaron|Charlene Biton|Ivan Cardona|Peter Conboy|Jaidig Cruz|Kristina Dargelyte|Shalon Delgado|Julia Frisoli|Takako Haywood|Dominick Mancino|Frances Mignano|Michael Angelo Ortiz|Adam S. Phillips|Chris Riggi|Antonio Saillant|Henry Santos|Bill Sorice|Steven Weisz|Bob Weston
title: Juramento de venganza
